detail_desc: Double-layered headband in a mohair-blend knit with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Triangle bikini top with overlocked frilled edges, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist, and overlocked edges at the hems.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and short slits in the sides.
Belt in embossed imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Long, wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Discreet side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bucket hat in soft faux shearling with a woven cotton lining.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Two-strand metal necklace. One of the chains is decorated with pearly plastic beads and one has small pendants. Adjustable length 41-49 cm.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with a three-part chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and front and back pockets. Fake fly, press-studs at the sides, jersey-lined legs and a lining at the hems in a patterned weave.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with appliqués at the knees, an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back and gathers at the shoulders. Two concealed buttons at the top, and a rounded hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with a reversible sequin motif.
Nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with short flutter sleeves.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Trousers in corduroy made from a cotton and modal blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
T-shirt in jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with a twisted trim at the neckline and sleeves, visible seams front and back and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a ribbed section in the middle of the foot and elastication around the openings for optimum comfort.
Hooded top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the top, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft, lightly brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Small stand-up collar with gathers all round, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Concealed pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide shoulder straps and a textured plastic ring at the front. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.

Shorter, padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, two flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjama bottoms in a patterned cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly.
Shorts in cotton twill with a drawstring at the waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers with lacing at the front and platform soles covered in braided jute. Canvas insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 4 cm.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter approx. 3.5 cm.
Swim top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif, stand-up collar and short raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in ribbed, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and overlocked edges at the sleeves and hem.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cap with a reversible sequin motif on the front, covered button on top and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Lightly padded sweatband.
Short dress in crinkled jersey with an angular neckline, short, tie-hem puff sleeves, a seam below the bust and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Wide top in soft, crêped viscose jersey with short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and patches on the inside of the legs. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Sandals in imitation leather with a decorative appliqué on the front, ankle strap with a hook and loop tab, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Scarf in a soft, brushed weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 55x190 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretchy denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs with raw-edge hems. Slim fit.
Jacquard-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated, roll-edge tops.
5-pocket, skinny-fit, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Coat in soft imitation suede with a collar, wrapover front and a tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders with front-facing shoulder seams, discreet side pockets, and a single back vent. No buttons. Lined.
Vest top in soft jersey made partly from organic cotton.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in a soft rib knit.
Fully-fashioned trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jeggings in soft, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and back pockets. Adjustable, elasticated waist in sizes 8-12Y.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft, organic cotton knit. Jumper with buttons down one side and long raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined.
Oversized tunic in an airy cotton weave with a tie-front V-neck and stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and flounces at the hem.
Top in a soft, fine knit with an embroidered pattern, small opening at the back, dropped shoulders and short cap sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
High-waisted trousers in sturdy jersey with a visible zip at the front and slim, tapered legs with a concealed zip at the hems.
Vest top in soft linen jersey with a deep V-neck front and back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Wide blouse in a crinkled weave with lace trims and embroidered details. V-shaped opening at the top, a seam under the bust and at the hem and long, wide sleeves with pleats and covered elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Cardigan in a soft, loose, textured knit with 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.
Shorts in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Joggers in jersey with a soft, brushed finish. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
High-waisted, fitted skirt.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fancy dress costume in velour with a zip down the front, a hood with appliqués, a faux fur mane and tail and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft, printed jersey with short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
Set with a sleeveless top and shorts in a patterned weave. Flared top with gathers at the top and elastication around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with elastication at the waist and hems.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed, stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline and decorative buttons down the front.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with elastication around the top, a loop at the back and textured rubber soles.
Patterned bikini. Top with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder. Bottoms with a lined gusset.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a square neckline that is elasticated at the front and short, butterfly sleeves. Buttons at the top, an elasticated seam and sewn-on tie belt at the waist. diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.
